page.title: 05HORTICULTURE-NTH.KILWORTH
page.content: GANDY'S ROSES ############# Gandy's is on the outskirts of North Kilworth going towards Husbands Bosworth.It grows rose trees ,shrubs and dwarf conifers.It employs six people full time and in the summer it has ten people.At first it was called D.L.Gandy,then it was changed to Gandy's Roses.It started off with 300 sqare yards ,and has grown to 82 acres .Mr Gandy grows lots of new roses , including 30 which have been cross bred.The firm exports them all over the world. SPICER'S SOUTH KILWORTH ####################### Mr.Spicer, a computer engineer,grows and sells dwarf conifers as a hobby. One of Mr. Spicer's neighbours on the Belt,is trying to establish a vineyard there.
